name: Trick or Treat simulator
description:
You are a alian symbyote pretending to be a trick or treater. Collect candy and 'collect' all the people in the neighborhood.

Developers:

Programming/Game Design: HedgehogMind

https://hedgehogmind.itch.io/

3DModeling/animation: JustinKaleva

https://justinkaleva.itch.io/

Royalty free music by Dee Yan-Key

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dee_Yan-Key
